allow:
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add policy suggestions feature with community voting

- New shortcodes: [dbpm_policy_suggestion] and [dbpm_suggestion_list]
- AJAX form submission with rate limiting (3/day per email)
- Community voting system with cookie-based tracking
- Admin panel for managing suggestions (pending/approved/implemented)
- Email notifications for new submissions
- Database table for persistent storage
- Responsive CSS with validation feedback

This feature enables community members to suggest new policies and vote
on existing suggestions, enhancing democratic participation.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(echo "=== DESKTOP MENU ===" /home/dave/skippy/bin/wp --path="/home/dave/skippy/rundaverun_local_site/app/public" menu item list 35 --fields=title --format=csv)
Bash(echo "=== DESKTOP MENU (10 items) ===" /home/dave/skippy/bin/wp --path="/home/dave/skippy/rundaverun_local_site/app/public" menu item list 35 --fields=title --format=csv)
Bash(echo "Exported Astra settings and theme mods" ls -lh "$SESSION_DIR"/*.json)
Bash(for skill in ci-cd-pipelines code-quality-standards error-tracking-monitoring frontend-development performance-optimization-web)
Bash(then mkdir -p "$skill" mv "$skill.md" "$skill/SKILL.md" echo "âœ… Organized $skill" fi done)
Bash(else echo "No watcher PID file found")
Bash(git -C /home/dave/skippy commit -m "chore: Update Claude Code auto-approvals")
Bash(git -C /home/dave/skippy commit -m "chore: Update Claude Code auto-approvals (final)")
Bash(git -C /home/dave commit -m "feat: Update document-intelligence skill with Intelligent File Processor v2.0.0")
Bash(else echo "android folder already moved or doesn''t exist")

Bash(git -C /home/dave/skippy commit -m "feat: Add broad autonomous operation permissions

Pre-approve common operations:
- File operations: mv, cp, mkdir, rm, touch
- Text processing: grep, sed, awk, tail, head
- System: ps, df, du
- Archives: tar, unzip
- Package managers: apt, npm, pip
- File tools: Read, Edit, Write, Glob, Grep on skippy/**

Enables true autonomous operation per autonomous-operations skill

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C /home/dave/skippy commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Skills creation standards and management tooling

Added comprehensive Skills infrastructure:
- Skills creation standards in CLAUDE.md with YAML frontmatter requirements
- 4 management tools: audit, fix, identify candidates, convert scripts
- Fixed all 49 existing skills to have proper YAML frontmatter
- Identified 235 scripts as skill conversion candidates

Tools created:
- audit_skills_v1.0.0.py: Validate skill structure
- fix_skill_frontmatter_v1.0.0.py: Auto-fix frontmatter issues  
- identify_skill_candidates_v1.0.0.py: Find conversion targets
- convert_script_to_skill_v1.0.0.py: Generate skills from scripts

All skills now compliant with Claude Agent Skills specification.
Backups saved to ~/.claude/skills_backup/

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
